ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] swimming skill?
ygData.msgSnippet: most likely when you get to lvl 24 your swimming skill will start to increase again.
ygData.messageBody:
most likely when you get to lvl 24 your swimming skill will start to
increase again.

On Thu, 27 Apr 2000 ug@... wrote:

> Bennett, Brian writes:
>
> > Something's bad wrong - am I nuts or does my human monk swimming cap at the
> > 5+5*level limit?
> >
> > With this and all the good faction rumors... *sigh*
>
> Ikkies START with 100 swimming, and mine's stopped at 120 at lvl 4.
> I'm guessing that the cap is thus 100 + (5 * lvl). Don't know if
> that's unique to ikkies (the cap) or if just by some luck of the throw
> of the dice, I haven't gotten any skill raises since I hit 120.
>
> I never thought swimming was lvl capped, but now I'm not so sure.
>
>
